title: >>> A Slight CHANGE
body_text:
"I have been getting some requests of moving DODGEBALL 23 to this Friday, rather than playing on Saturday. Concern over this deals with the current weather situation, seeing how it supposed to rain on Saturday again. Now, granted it won't be as windy as last weekend, but I think it's safe to say that this time of year, the rain and cold air don't mix all to well. I seriously need feedback on this, just so that I know everyone is aware of what might happen. If dodgeball does indeed move to this Friday, then I want to make sure it's okay with everyone else, or at least a large portion of you, the players. Please let me know immediately as its your feedback that will decide when DODGEBALL 23 will take place."
>> Decision to make: The date of DODGEBALL 23
Friday, January 20th, 2006
Saturday, January 21st, 2006
"I personally am for the move to Friday, as are a few others. Nothing will happen however unless there are more responses."
- JOHN TRONOLONE -
January 18th, 2006
